name: Run (itch) (Raghav Suriyashekar)
description:
FPS made for the 7dfps GameJam

Exciting shooter in an infinite procedurally generated terrain. Oh and there's missiles too!!!

Shoot missiles before they explode on you.

Stay away from the growing lava pits and seek health and ammo in the healing regions. 

Good luck!

I hope you have as much fun playing it as i had making it!

Cheers!

trip
